text: Rebel Without a Cause is a 1955 American drama movie directed by Nicholas Ray. It was produced by David Weisbart. It was written by Stewart Scott and Irving Shulman. It stars James Dean, Natalie Wood, and Sal Mineo. It was released on October 27, 1955. Category:1955 drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Ray Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Rebel Without a Cause
